snippet.title: Redo! - Release Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10002948

The age of humanity has gone. In a world dominated by biomachines, monstrosities, dolls and the cold - a voice beckons you out into the ruins. "Meet me at the Solar Cathedral". REDO!, a dark, evocative non-linear action RPG, is coming to PS4 & PS5 on June 22nd. 

In order to survive in this world after the end of mankind, the player will have a diverse selection of weaponry and items available, ranging from energy blades, to riot shields, to rocket launchers. 
The twisted biomachines which inhabit the lonely world of REDO! breathe fire, electrify air and spit plasma. You will need every tool available to survive.
#PS5Games #PS4Games
